title: Mouse button not working
body: In game the button on my mouse that I have binded for ignite, does not work. Yet on the home page I can still bind that same button. so the problem is only in game.

replies.body:
Support is still seeing some players not able to bind Mouse Buttons 4/5. :(

My best advice is ticketing about this known issue to Tech [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They may have some steps that you can try out that can rebind those mouse buttons, and can also gather data from your problem that can better help them find a solution for everyone. ^^
